name: MemoryBox
0:
”Alexa, tell Memory Box that I put the heating pad in the linen closet.”
”Alexa, ask Memory Box where I put the heating pad.”
”Alexa, ask Memory Box where the binoculars are.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: memory box
des: You know how there are some things you only use every six months or so, and you can never remember where you put them? Memory Box is here to help! Done with that heating pad? After you stuff it in the back of the linen closet, tell Memory Box. Next time your back goes out, Memory Box remembers right where it is.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
